name: Particle Pusher
description:
AD/Left & Right arrow keys to rotate your paddles. See how long you can control the particle as it accelerates! Made in 3 hours for Trijam #48 with Godot. Click the embed if your controls aren't working.

Source: https://github.com/iwilliams/trijam-48

Music: Final Hour by isaiah658

Font: VCR OSD MONO by Riciery Leal

Color Palette: Ice Cream GB by Kerrie Lake
